data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Animal migration is commonly seen in the natural world. For example, some birds might prefer certain weather and only wish to live in a tropical region. However, after several months of living in a warm area, this region’s climate might start to change from hot to cold, and it means that it is time for these birds to migrate to a new area that currently has a warm climate. Therefore, they will start to migrate as a group or groups.
data.referenceText: Talk about a current or historical migration of people or animals.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈论当前或历史上的人或动物的迁移。
